        public akka.actor.Props props(scala.collection.immutable.List<StateVariable.DemandState> demands,

                              RunId runId,
                              akka.util.Timeout timeout,
                              scala.Function2<StateVariable.DemandState,StateVariable.CurrentState,java.lang.Object> matcher)
        Props used to create the HcdStatusMatcherActor actor.

        Parameters:
        demands - the target states that will be compared to their current states
        hcds - the target HCD actors
        replyTo - the actor to reply to
        runId - the runId to use in the reply
        timeout - the amount of time to wait for a match before giving up and replying with a Timeout message
        matcher - the function used to compare the demand and current states
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
